languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молча кивает Ксавьеру. Тот отвечает дознавателю едва склоненной головой.{/n}
{n}Heinrix nods silently at Calcazar, who responds by ever so slightly bowing his head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希向卡尔卡扎默默地点了点头，卡尔卡扎微微低头回应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods silently at Calcazar, who responds by ever so slightly bowing his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希向希维尔默默地点了点头，希维尔微微低头回应。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがカルカサルに向かって静かに頷けば、彼は小さく頭を下げて答えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods silently at Calcazar, who responds by ever so slightly bowing his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがカルカサルに向かって静かに頷けば、彼は小さく頭を下げて答えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix asiente en silencio a Calcazar, que responde inclinando ligeramente la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods silently at Calcazar, who responds by ever so slightly bowing his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix asiente en silencio a Xavier, que responde inclinando ligeramente la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nickt Calcazar stumm zu. Dieser neigt als Antwort kaum wahrnehmbar den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods silently at Calcazar, who responds by ever so slightly bowing his head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix adresse un simple signe de tête à Calcazar, qui lui rend la pareille.{/n}
